Contact Me

Emotion-Focus Therapy Mindfulness Group.

No meditation experience required.

  • Are you interested in mindfulness?
  • Would you like to develop or deepen your meditation practice?
  • Are you feeling stuck in patterns you are interested in developing a deeper understanding to?

This group offers the participant the opportunity to establish a mindfulness meditation practice that emphasizes deepening experience. By your deepening experiences you will respond differently and make better sense of and navigate your life.

The group will start Jan 28 and run for 8 weeks. The sessions are 2 hours long.

The sessions will include education on developing a meditation practice, the opportunity to meditate weekly in a group setting and discuss your meditation experience guided by a therapist.

If you are interested in more information about this group or individual therapy please call 416-829-5334, email laura@laurapearsoncounselling.ca , or go to laurapearsoncounselling.ca.

Location: I am located in the east end of Toronto, in the Riverdale area. My office is located on the Bloor-Danforth Subway line and is easy to access from any area of Toronto.
